entry.title: $2400 // NO FEE- Massive Downtown Brooklyn one bedroom apt *Laundry/backyard
entry.content:
Available for ASAP move in! Laundry in basement and shared backyard. Near 7 different subways!

When you walk into the apartment, you are in the kitchen that has large steel appliances, two large windows, and a fire escape. No obstructed views!

The bathroom is off the kitchen and is quite large with a tub and two windows as well.

Next to the kitchen, you'll walk pass two identical rooms (can nicely fit a couch and coffee table in one, and a medium sized dining table in the other)

Next is the bedroom. It's as large as the kitchen and can fit a king size bed and has two large windows facing a quiet residential street (no truck beeping, etc).

Off the bedroom is a small room you can make into a cute office or perfect for a nursery.
Awesome apartment with a true king size bedroom with a separate kitchen and two small rooms in between. It's a great flex 2 if you have a family or want extra room for an office! It's a 8 unit well maintained building with laundry in the basement, and a shared backyard for tenants.

Located in a very convenient area near 8 different subways, just one stop from Manhattan.

Guarantors are accepted, and pets are accepted upon approval!

Contact me immediately to come see it! Talk soon
